name: ax-widget-listing-activity
description: Reads a file listing and extracts information on available widgets and activities.

fileListing.description: Extract widget information from a file listing.

resource.description: The name of a resource containing the application url and the path to the file listing as provided by the directory tree grunt task.

list.description: A list with json files which contain information about used widgets.

applicationUrl.description: The url of the application with the widgets. Default is the application in which the activity is included.

widgetListing.description: Provide a list of available widgets and activities as a resource.
